name: I failed the game jam! - a Tattle Tail "demo"(?)
name_original: I failed the game jam! - a Tattle Tail "demo"(?)
description:
wow, what an experience! it's too bad i didn't get the game finished by the deadlines, but that was quite the motivation to start and project and learn a whole bunch - I learned about GBStudio and I learned about myself.

very important lessons about myself.

I might as well call this "demo" - personal growth.

...

OK GREAT! See you next time :D

...

PostScript: this is a 'playable demo' of the assets i was able to make and stitch together during the game jam - i'm going to continue to work on the game, but i wanted to share this li'l failure cause that's also valid and important.
